Out of hard drive space. Unable to save photo.
Out of hard drive space. Unable to complete download.
Profile names must contain at least one letter or number.
File names must contain at least one letter or number.
That profile already exists. Please choose a different name.
Duplicate or blank photo album names are not permitted. Please choose a different name.
There was a problem creating that profile. Please try a different name.
File is read-only. Unable to save game.
File is corrupted or otherwise unreadable. Unable to load game.
The save you loaded contains references to items not installed on your machine. As a result, you may notice missing objects, animals, or fences!
Unable to delete game. The file may be read-only.
Unable to save user options. The current profile may be invalid.
The save you are trying to load was created by a newer version of Zoo Tycoon 2 not supported by this version.
The save you are trying to load is no longer supported by this version of Zoo Tycoon 2.
Zoo Tycoon 2 Startup Error
Error in call to InitConfigInformation.
Failed to create Direct3D Object.
Error in call to Config_InitVideoCardInfo.
Failed to enumerate graphics adapter modes.
You need at least a 1.0 GHz processor for Zoo Tycoon 2 to run properly. (%s MHz detected.)
You need at least %1s MB of system memory to run Zoo Tycoon 2. (%2s MB detected.)
You need at least %1s MB of video memory to run Zoo Tycoon 2. (%2s MB detected.)
Zoo Tycoon 2 does not support the %s graphics card.
The %s graphics card is a prototype card and may cause problems with Zoo Tycoon 2.
Your graphics driver is not valid for your operating system. Please contact your graphics card vendor for an updated driver.
Your graphics driver may be too old to run Zoo Tycoon 2. Please contact your graphics card vendor for an updated driver.
Your sound driver is not valid for your operating system. Please contact your sound card vendor for an updated driver.
Your sound driver may be too old to run Zoo Tycoon 2. Please contact your sound card vendor for an updated driver.
Zoo Tycoon 2 was unable to create a graphics renderer. Please contact your graphics card vendor to make sure you have the latest driver.
Zoo Tycoon 2 does not appear to be properly installed. Please check your system settings and reinstall from the CD.
